thread.section_title: TicketNetwork Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketNetwork | www.ticketnetwork.com
thread.title: Garland Parker

author: Garland Parker
title: Garland Parker
text:
The globe trotters were great and the kids there had a blast, The Xl center is a nice venue but the parking situation sucks!
I parked on the street in a place where the parking used to be free after 6pm, we even asked an officer of it was ok to park there and he did that he didn't see any problem.
To come out after the show and find a 45 dollar ticket from the New parking authority , It's definitely a deal Breaker and we will think twice before going to anything else In downtown hartford , I understand that the city is trying to make money but really?
